for i in range(n):
 count = 0
 s = input()
 for i in range(1, len(s)):
  if(s[i-1] != s[i]):
   count += 1 
   
 if(s[0] != s[-1]): 
  count += 1 
 print("uniform" if(count <=2 ) else "non-uniform")

t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 n=input()
 m=n.count('10')+n.count('01')
 if(n[-1]!=n[0]):
  m+=1
 print('uniform' if m<=2 else 'non-uniform')

for i in range(int(input())):
 x=input()
 c=x.count('10')+x.count('01')
 if(x[-1]!=x[0]):
  c+=1
 print('uniform' if c<=2 else 'non-uniform')
